document_data.title: A Lesson in Love
document_data.design: [[Benoit de Bernardy]]{{Cite adventurers league/A Lesson in Love|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Lesson in Love''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Chult]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 11{{th}}- to 16{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''An old elf has wandered into the city from the jungle--prattling on about his long-lost daughter to anyone whose ear he can bend. Though most in Port Nyanzaru dismiss him as mad, he speaks the truth. Can you find and save his daughter?''|}}
